programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer
programme.desc: In a world where magic is waning and technology prevails, 15-year-old Jennifer Strange runs a magician employment agency and discovers the last dragon is being hunted.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: A troubled teenage girl moves in with her dad in a small isolated town. She falls for a mysterious loner with a shocking secret - could he be anything to do with the local murders that have started taking place?

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in LA. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: Now the brothers must team up with April O'Neil and their new ally Casey Jones, to battle their enemies and face their biggest threat: the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle For The Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: A cop must fight his evil double from a parallel universe in order to save himself and the world.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and family are killed by the infamous and elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessed with revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Tears Of The Sun
programme.desc: In Tears of the Sun, a Navy SEAL team is sent to rescue a doctor in war-torn Nigeria. The mission shifts from extraction to saving refugees as they face brutal rebels while navigating the dangerous jungle.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Will and Jake Grimm are travelling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires genuine courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Filipino actor, model and swimmer Enchong Dee and his celebrity friend Ria, to explore the highs and lows of Hong Kong. They are eager to push their boundaries in this thrilling new adventure.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

A fatal duel has just begun!

While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: John is heading out on tour with his band, and to send him off Rachael whips up one of his favourite meals: seafood fra diavolo, a combination of shellfish and pasta tossed with a tomato-based sauce.

programme.title: Kings Of BBQ
programme.desc: Anthony and Cedric's efforts have paid off... ultimate restaurateur Mr. Robert Earl (Planet Hollywood, Earl of Sandwich) comes calling to propose a NEW restaurant venture with AC Barbeque.

programme.title: Killer Fortune Teller
programme.desc: When Michael, an older single man looking for companionship, falls for alluring psychic Janis, she sees him as an easy mark. But will Janis be exposed by Virginia, Michael's concerned relative?

programme.title: Love At First Lie
programme.desc: Kate thinks she's found her perfect online love match in a Walker, a jet-setting art dealer. But after she learns he's just con artist who targets women for money, she plans payback.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael teams up with her friend Dr. Will Li, an author and medical scientist whose work focuses on eating for well-being. Together, they prepare a meal of grilled sea bass and sautéed baby bok choy.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael loves Armenian food and shows how to prepare a traditional Armenian Easter feast of stuffed cabbage rolls, baked rainbow trout and sweet and savoury glazed fruit and potatoes.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael brings a taste of Mexico to Lake George with her twist on chile relleno stuffed poblano peppers. Her version is filled with tortilla chips, cheese, pinto bean dip and more cheese.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: As Sweet Week continues, the contestants enter the MasterChef Kitchen to find glistening gems of all colours sitting on stands. It’s a taste test, and each of the gems are made from jelly.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: It’s the final day of Sweet Week and the cooks must battle it out in today’s elimination to earn their place in the halfway point of this competition.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Chef Nornie Bero surprises the top 12 contestants with a mystery box filled with native Australian ingredients. They must tame these bold flavours and impress Nornie.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Aussie legend Curtis Stone returns for a slow cooked lamb and ravioli cook-along, which descends into chaos as a home-made ricotta derails some contestants multiple times.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Curtis Stone returns for the second night in a row and sets up the ultimate challenge, to create a winter warmer ice-cream and pair it with a dessert.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: With high expectations, the Dokbakz arrive in Australia, where nature and art coexist. After landing at Sydney Airport, they are eager to explore one of the city's most famous landmarks: the Opera House.

programme.title: To Kill A Stepfather
programme.desc: Nicole learns that her stepfather suffered a deadly fall down the stairs and her mother has been arrested for his murder. As Nicole begins investigating, she learns that everything is not as it seems.

programme.title: The Plot To Kill My Mother
programme.desc: A young woman who unknowingly grew up in federal witness protection reels after her mother's murder, leading her to question everything. She decides to leave the program and find the killer.

programme.title: My Landlord Wants Me Dead
programme.desc: When Madeline loses her job, she turns to her Aunt Grace for help. A secluded ranch house with a cute neighbour seems too good to be true - until strange events begin to occur.

programme.desc: An exciting former rental property dream house turns into a nightmare when everything that can go wrong, does. With an exploding budget, the team will really have to think out of the box.

programme.desc: Overcoming overwhelming odds fighting throughout the Mediterranean, Caesar's decisive actions bring him massive success and make him the most powerful man in the world.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Otherworld
programme.desc: Why do so many cultures across the world tell stories of people who can transform into animals? Could they have their roots in lost human abilities? Keys to unravelling this mystery could lie in Indonesia.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: After finding Nazi artifacts at a sunken pier, Darrell continues his search to a site known as Target 3 where they find a possible component of a Nazi secret weapon that changes their investigation.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S1)
programme.desc: The team dives deep looking for the biggest vessel to ever vanish in the Bermuda Triangle — the USS Cyclops. Was the USS Cyclops the victim of a terrifying, ship-sinking phenomenon known as a rogue wave?

programme.title: The Food That Built Asia
programme.desc: Discover the spicy legacy of Singapore’s national treasure, Chilli Crab, a dish invented by a housewife, has managed to culturally feed a nation and drawn crowds from every corner of the globe.

programme.title: The Food That Built Asia
programme.desc: Ironically, many components of Malaysia’s national dish, Nasi Lemak are NOT even from Malaysia! Let’s take a look at how this old rice dish came to be and how its evolution tells the history of the nation.

programme.desc: Throughout ancient cultures, there are stories of god-like beings providing instruction to early humans, helping our ancestors to establish the first civilisations and teaching them. Could it be true?

programme.desc: From the strict codes of Hammurabi to the secretly malevolent evil eye, history is full of acts committed in the name of revenge. We uncover the forces that have driven individuals to seek vengeance.

programme.desc: With weather preventing Darrell Miklos and the team from diving from the boat, they attempt a risky strategy. Garth makes a solo journey to explore a deserted island where he discovers a mysterious cross.

programme.desc: A new, subsurface investigation on Skinwalker Ranch leads to a baffling discovery near Homestead Two.

programme.desc: Your backstage pass to the world's greatest hair & make-up gurus of fashion! find out all the latest hair and make-up trends; discover the secrets of the models, learn the tricks of the trade & the beauty tips to be sure to get you noticed.

programme.title: Hair & Make Up
programme.desc: Your backstage pass to the world's greatest hair & make-up gurus of fashion! find out all the latest hair and make-up trends; discover the secrets of the models, learn the tricks of the trade & the beauty tips to be sure to get you noticed.

programme.title: F-People
programme.desc: FashionTV brings you an exclusive look at all of the fashion week front rows, red carpets, hollywood glamour and launch events

programme.title: Fashion Trends
programme.desc: FashionTV brings you all the worldwide fashion weeks, exotic & unique collections & trends from around the world.

programme.title: Fashion Trends
programme.desc: FashionTV brings you all the worldwide fashion weeks, exotic & unique collections & trends from around the world.

programme.title: Red Carpet
programme.desc: FashionTV brings you an exclusive look at all of the fashion week front rows, red carpets and Hollywood glamour.

programme.title: The Story Of
programme.desc: Join FashionTV, as we take you on a complete journey with fashion’s greatest icons. Celebrate world glamor with breathtaking fashion, passion, and all the action

programme.title: Kadenang Bulaklak
programme.desc: Three little girls were given up for adoption after their parents were killed in an accident. Vina, the oldest sister, was left behind with an aunt. She vowed that one day, she would find all her sisters and reunite her family.

programme.title: Jesus Calderon (Maton)
programme.desc: This is another take-off on the eternal poor boy loves rich girl tale. Love wins out in the end but only after Jesus Calderon has proven himself, and the lovely damsel in distress has learned to love and trust him with all her heart.

programme.title: Kung Mahawi Man Ang Ulap (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The happy life of Hilda and her widowed mother, Gloria, changed for the worse when Eddie and his family moved in as their tenants. In no time at all, Gloria had gotten married to Eddie and was providing for his entire family. Still, she lived for the day when she would be able to reclaim what's rightfully hers.

programme.title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.

programme.title: Anak Ni Boy Negro
programme.desc: Nap never knew his father, and wanting to please his mother, he never bothered to find out anything about the notorious small time hood. But in his heart, he knew he deserved more than the shanty he grew up in.

programme.title: Manalo Matalo, Mahal Kita
programme.desc: Mikee played the girl selling lotto tickets. Cesar spent his last ten pesos on a ticket hoping to win the jackpot. The two had some fights, which eventually fade off as both fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Dyesebel (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The retelling of the classic tale by the great Mars Ravelo. After years of hiding from a cruel, suspicious society on the land, mermaid Dyesebel (Charlene Gonzales) returns and falls in love with a man named Fredo (Matthew Mendoza).

programme.title: Dapat Ka Bang Mahalin?
programme.desc: The story, which was based on a popular comic’s serial, closely resembled what would later happen in real life to local moviedom's favorite couple. Sharon and Gabby portrayed teenagers who eloped and got married against the advice of everybody.

programme.title: Kapag Wala Nang Batas
programme.desc: Gabriel (Chuck Perez) decides to enter the seminary to escape the violent world his family is involved with. But he soon realizes that he cannot totally breakout from his legacy.

programme.title: Sobra-Sobra, Labis-Labis
programme.desc: Pinay, a young and fragile lass whose vulnerability was exploited by her stepfather who was ne'er-do-well scattergood while Tisay, a perceptive flesh vending streetsmart whose openness to things around her made her an interesting character study for a new-sprung writer.

programme.title: Dos Bravos
programme.desc: Pancho (Niño Muhlach) is travelling from one town to the next in the hope of finding his long lost father. His only clue is a handkerchief embroidered with an emblem of Hacienda BM. Later, Pancho ask the help of Valdes (Dante Varona).

programme.title: Andrea, Paano Ba Ang Maging Isang Ina?
programme.desc: Two teachers find themselves on opposite sides in the fight for freedom. Nora Aunor is the woman who chose to join the rebels while her friend, Gina Alajar opted for a quiet life with her husband.

programme.title: A E I O U
programme.desc: Five misbegotten but witty kids survived this cold-hearted community.They found their hero in the person of Captain Juan,a funny but dedicated cop.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 3
programme.desc: Ezekiel signs up for a buffalo hunting expedition to prove his manhood. Meanwhile, Benny teaches Prudence how to be a bandit.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 4
programme.desc: The wagon train stops in the sinful town of Branchwater, luring Ezekiel into a night of debauchery and temptation.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 5
programme.desc: The wagon train meets a religious group being led West by a holy prophet. Meanwhile, Benny tries to reconnect with his estranged daughter.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 6
programme.desc: While Ezekiel and Prudence try to enjoy the Fourth of July holiday, Benny attempts to reclaim his place as the number one outlaw in the west.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 7
programme.desc: Benny tries to become a hero to a Native American tribe.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 8
programme.desc: The wagon train attempts to cross the Blue Mountains, but Ezekiel worries their journey has been cursed by God. Meanwhile, Benny tries to make amends with Trig.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 9
programme.desc: Ezekiel, Benny, and the farmers face starvation as they try to survive a blizzard. Meanwhile, Todd gets into politics.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 10
programme.desc: The wagon train faces its final showdown.

programme.title: Smallville S1 17
programme.desc: Clark must stop a man who seeks to relieve the suffering of the sick with a deadly touch -- and Whitney’s ailing father might be the next victim.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set "within the architecture of the mind." Written, directed and produced by Oscar and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon).

programme.title: The West Wing S1 21
programme.desc: Bartlet works to reform campaign finance.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 9
programme.desc: Can friends with benefits still be friends without? Leonard and Penny try hanging out alone, while Sheldon must overcome his fear of birds.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 10
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes jealous and considers taking his relationship with Amy to the next level when Stuart (guest star KEVIN SUSSMAN) from the comic book store asks her out on a date.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 11
programme.desc: Leonard must face his fears after being contacted by his high school tormentor (guest star LANCE BARBER), while Penny realizes that she might have been a bully herself.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 12
programme.desc: Sheldon gets in trouble with Amy, and it's up to Penny to teach him how to be a better boyfriend. Howard, meanwhile, must come to grips with Bernadette's dislike of children.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 21
programme.desc: Bartlet works to reform campaign finance.

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: Firefighter Gordon Brewer, is done putting out fires and ready to start one of his own. When his wife and child are horrifically killed in an international terrorist bombing -- linked to Claudio "The Wolf" Perrini -- the CIA and FBI offer no answers and no response. With the official investigation going nowhere, and haunted by the thought of his family's killer walking away scot-free, Gordon swears revenge, even if it takes him to Colombia.

programme.title: Clash Of The Titans
programme.desc: In CLASH OF THE TITANS, the ultimate struggle for power pits men against kings and kings against gods. But the war between the gods themselves could destroy the world. Sam Worthington (Terminator Salvation, Avatar) stars as the Greek hero Perseus in this spectacular retelling of the classic myth (and '80s cult classic film). Born of a god, but raised as a man, Perseus is helpless to save his family from the clutches of Hades (Oscar nominee Ralph Fiennes -- Harry Potter films), the vengeful god of the underworld. With nothing left to lose, he volunteers to lead a dangerous mission to defeat Hades before he can seize power from Zeus (Oscar nominee Liam Neeson -- Batman Begins) and unleash hell on earth. With a daring band of warriors, Perseus sets off on a perilous journey deep into forbidden worlds. Battling unholy demons and fearsome beasts, he will triumph only if he can accept his power as a god, defy his fate and create his own destiny.

programme.title: Smallville S1 17
programme.desc: Clark must stop a man who seeks to relieve the suffering of the sick with a deadly touch -- and Whitney’s ailing father might be the next victim.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 16
programme.desc: Philip risks losing a big account when he advises a superstitious client to stop allowing Will's spontaneous remarks to influence business decisions.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 17
programme.desc: When Will complains that no black history is taught in his school, Vivian Banks takes on the job temporarily, and both Will and Carlton find out they are in for a lot of hard work.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 18
programme.desc: Will sneaks out with Philip's mother to a rap concert. Despite his anger, Philip realizes he must worry less about his mother's health and allow her to live life as she wants.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 19
programme.desc: Jazz fixes Will up with his beautiful sister, Janet (guest star Vivica A. Fox - "Independence Day"), who turns out to be extremely bossy.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 20
programme.desc: Will feels responsible enough to take the family car to Nevada for a concert, but when he escorts the teenage daughter of a British lord, he finds himself out of his element.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 13
programme.desc: Everything might change when Leonard offers Penny a spur of the moment invitation to a romantic dinner for two on the 100th episode of the series.

programme.title: Friends S6 5
programme.desc: Joey pretends to be the owner of a Porsche whose owner left his keys at Central Perk. Rachel and Ross get divorced. Chandler and Monica babysit Phoebe's triplets.

programme.title: Friends S6 6
programme.desc: The guys and the women prepare for big changes in their living arrangements. Monica and Rachel reminisce – and it's not all good memories.

programme.title: Friends S6 7
programme.desc: Chandler learns how obsessively neat Monica is when he attempts to do her a favor. Joey desperately tries not to flirt with his sexy new roommate. Phoebe's running style embarrasses Rachel.

programme.title: Friends S6 8
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

programme.title: Friends S6 9
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Chandler tries to gain favor with Monica's parents – but an old secret involving Ross causes problems. Undomestic Rachel's dessert proves intriguing.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 05
programme.desc: Michael reveals the transformative properties of fruits and vegetables, and shows a caterer the true power of dairy products. Plus, an antique store customer is stunned when a species of termite literally chews through the scenery!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 06
programme.desc: At an antique store, Michael shows off an impossible way to organize your clothes, and back at the supermarket we find out that there are some serious surprises lurking in our favorite foods. Finally, at the Navy Yard, Michael pushes his skills to the limit when he attempts one of his most ambitious feats yet - tricking two people at the same time!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 07
programme.desc: Michael and his fellow employees debate the authenticity of a giant lizard and find a game with a very specific target audience. Then at the diner, he adds some spice to lunch time and gives patrons the chills while demonstrating a new way to cool soup. Finally at the furniture store, Michael shows his coworker that impossible things can happen in the blink of an eye.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 08
programme.desc: In this special crossover event, the Impractical Jokers help Michael stun coffee bar customers - but soon discover the joke is on them! Plus, Michael's woodland creatures display fantastic hidden abilities.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 4
programme.desc: The guys play a game of copycat at the park while babysitting kids. Then, they hit the supermarket for an epic battle of catch and release, and the loser learns that creeping around the gym is more uncomfortable than working out.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 5
programme.desc: The guys try to dig themselves out of a jam by asking strangers to help bury bizarre items, then compete to see who can cling the longest to a stranger's car. And the big loser makes a room full of enemies at an auction house.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 6
programme.desc: The guys pose as crabby NYC cab drivers, then head to the park to solicit undeserved congratulations. And in the special travel punishment, the big loser plays sheriff in an old Nevada town full of outlaws.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 7
programme.desc: The guys pose as crummy cashiers at a grocery store and then head to the mall for a touching game involving laser pointers. Plus, the loser is soaked with embarrassment after making it clear to some swimmers that he's #1.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 8
programme.desc: The guys pose as inhospitable hosts at a restaurant, then beg strangers to babysit their grandfathers. And it's a top-secret mission when the big loser unknowingly endures the longest punishment in Jokers' history.

Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.desc: In April 1985, two western teenagers studying in Hong Kong were set upon by a gang of Chinese youths, who proceeded to torture and stab them to death.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: The Rifkin Murders
programme.desc: Joel Rifkin took the lives of 17 women in New York. Almost thirty years later, a TV producer leverages his relationship with New York's most prolific serial killer to get information police could use.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: In Mobile, a 70-year-old Vietnam vet is found beaten to death in his home where detectives discover threatening letters. In New Orleans, Detective Amy Robinson works the case of a man shot behind a store.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A man in Virginia Beach parties a little too hard at a parade and suffers a medical emergency when he ends up in jail. Meanwhile, a stand-up comedian learns the hard way that not everyone can take a joke.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When the body of a Jane Doe is found dumped on a roadside, it's up to Dr. Satish Chundru to identify her and find out how she died, spawning an investigation retracing the victim's last night.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: In Mobile, a 70-year-old Vietnam vet is found beaten to death in his home where detectives discover threatening letters. In New Orleans, Detective Amy Robinson works the case of a man shot behind a store.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: People in charming Hope Mills, are on edge when a high school freshman vanishes while on her way to meet a friend. When she turns up dead three weeks later, the community rallies to flush out the killer.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: With the help of digital forensics, authorities are able to debunk the alibi of one of the last people to see a 24-year-old missing jogger in rural Arkansas, making him the primary suspect in her murder.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: JaRay Wilson texted her mother just minutes before she vanished. For over a year, the teen's friends, family, and community searched for answers.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A Florida woman hides in her bathroom when a strange man breaks into her home in the middle of the night. A man trapped in his overturned truck calls 911 in a panic as the vehicle fills with icy water.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Critical Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: A rookie leans on video surveillance to find a convenience store killer. A new detective utilizes facial recognition software to try and solve his case, and another investigator tackles a love triangle.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: a man drives through a store hours after having trashed it; a Florida neighbourhood falls victim to shocking deliveries; and more!

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)
programme.desc: A man leads police on a high-speed chase in a stolen mail truck. A restaurant owner is arrested after hiding drugs in a takeout box. A pizza delivery guy helps the cops arrest a thief; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: When a 15-year-old boy is murdered after getting in over his head, detectives hope a Snapchat message can lead them to his killer.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S5)
programme.desc: When a mother learns her daughter has been abused by the teenager's estranged father, the police are called. But, before the investigation can gather speed, the father visits unexpectedly.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nuï. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: Api and Koro return to the sports field to try to understand what happened to eric. They reconstruct the events and gather clues.

programme.title: Le Refuge D'audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Whilst Vic wants to save trees, Sigis tries to replace Evelyne at home so that she can take part in a carpentry competition.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances
programme.desc: August 1944. The village sees its last clashes against German troops. They finally flee. The time has come to settle scores between those who resisted and those who collaborated. Ernest and Colette are finally reunited with their parents.

programme.title: Matiere Grise
programme.desc: The magazine programme which takes the mystery out of science, encouraging us to think... without all the brain work!

programme.title: Louis Et La Faune Urbaine
programme.desc: Louis discovers a family of racoons living inside the ceiling space of a house. The young are now over five weeks old and very aggressive.

programme.title: Le Beau Velo De Ravel
programme.desc: A bike journey, presented by Adrien Joveneau, along the entire RAVeL network, an independent cycle path network in Wallonia. With each programme, the presenter tells us of a stage in his journey and talks about mobility and tourist resources in the region.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'azur.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: After growing up in a favela and discovering the flute by chance, Eduardo Rosa is now flutist at the National Music Conservatory of Paris. After ten years in the capital, this Brazilian divides his time between concerts and his pupils, to whom he passes on the love of music.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: He is the first Monegasque to win the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters: Romain Arneodo, winner of the men's doubles at the 2025 event, looks back on his career.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Serge A Paris
programme.desc: Serge meets Quebec actress and director Monia Chokri and Franco-Quebec singer and actor Aliocha Schneider. We then follow him to the Paris suburbs, as he holds the final auditions for his next project, the show ''La Haine''.

programme.title: Green
programme.desc: Antoine Auriol discovers the Pacific island of Tahiti. Accompanied by the wildlife rangers dedicated to protecting the island and its lagoon, he enjoys an immersion in Tahitian culture, closely linked to its natural ecosystem. Jessica, Dominique, Cindy, Patrick, Richard, Cecile, Matahi and Lea recount this intimate connection.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Africa Fashion Up, exploring the world of African fashion. A wardrobe-essential everyone wears, the very French story of jeans. programme.desc: The Musee des Beaux-Arts du Perigord offers a rich and varied selection of works. In his studio, Tuan Tran combines the finesse of glass with the brutality of concrete. At Schiaparelli, masculine and feminine are confidently combined. Dive behind the scenes of D'Offard wallpaper production.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.
